item.title: About
item.description: Hi there My name is Chimera I’m a programmer for interest and fun. Right now focus on: game (c++, unity, opengl) mobile (obj-c, java) AI (recognition) Network (chat, video streaming, match making ) VR (study, game) AR (lbs, card game, navigation ) My Email
